title: John Legend And Ariana Grande's Cover Of "Beauty And The Beast" Is So Damn Good

text:
ID: 10461855 2. The latest rendition of the enchanting song was released earlier today. Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=vScUbKoE-qs . youtube.com ID: 10461643 3. If you’re a super-fan of the original movie, you’ll remember that the song was originally sung by Angela Lansbury, who also played the role of Mrs. Potts in the 1991 animated film… Neilson Barnard / Getty Images
Walt Disney Pictures
 ID: 10462045 4. …and there was a single pop version released too, which was sung by Celine Dion and Peabo Bryson. Patrick Hertzog / AFP / Getty Images
Peabo Bryson / Getty Images
 ID: 10462073 5. And now, a new generation of kids will be able to cherish the iconic tune. View this image ›
Walt Disney Pictures / Via youtube.com ID: 10462085 But before you go, tell us which version you like most.
